SELECT id id, project project, device device, applicant applicant, status status, DATE_FORMAT(begin_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') beginTime, DATE_FORMAT(end_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') endTime DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') createTime, DATE_FORMAT(update_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') updateTime FROM book_recode WHERE status != -1 ORDER BY id LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_recode (project, device, begin_time, end_time,applicant,status) VALUES (#{project}, #{device}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime},#{applicant},#{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE book_recode SET status=-1 WHERE id = #{id}
